file_content.text: Whoa! A major? Havoc Squad! This is huge! Oh, I'm Kal, it's a real honor to meet you, a real honor! You're here to help, right?
Give me the situation, Kal.
Affirmative.
I didn't come here to play rescue team, but that's what I'm doing.
Supposedly.
Yeah, well, I'd say we're all doing a bit of improvising here, so you'll fit in fine.
There's a war on, Kal. Skip to the details.
Keep it brief.
Yeah, you got it, Major, you got it. We'll have you back in the field in no time, just you watch.
With all the commotion going on, we started seeing breakouts from one of the labor camps. Some real bad characters in there, believe me.
The worst is a guy named Gouge. You don't even wanna know what that freak was up to before they locked him up.
You told Harlan that several pilots were trapped in the prison now?
What about the pilots?
Right, because of Gouge! Let me explain.
If there's a chance I'll run into the guy, I should know about him.
I need all of the details.
Well, look, they don't call him Gouge for nothing, right?
You're wasting my time.
One of the guard officers, Brok, wanted to storm the labor camp and make sure Gouge didn't escape. Bit obsessed, that guy.
Three of our people volunteered to back Brok up. But things went bad at the labor camp, and now they're all trapped.
Can your pilots confirm their current situation?
Are you still in contact?
Can't get through to them. Last I heard, they were holed up pretty good.
In what way, exactly, did things go bad?
Be more specific.
A lot more of the prisoners are running loose than we expected. A whole lot more. And they're all armed.
If you can't handle a simple op like this, stick to the cockpit.
This is pathetic.
No ships to be had, nowhere, nohow. Have to make do the best we can, you know?
Here are the last coordinates Brok gave me. You should find everyone there--a little stressed, so take it easy on 'em.
Oh! One other thing. Somebody's shut off all our surveillance cameras in the area. If you could switch them back on, it'd help a lot.
Grab the pilots, fix the cameras--I'm on it.
Consider it done.
Good luck, Major!
The Dagger Wing pilots are my first priority. Everything else is secondary.
We'll see what happens.
Whoa, nice! I've never been a priority before.
I'm already wasting enough time for you people.
Forget it.
Whoa, hey, easy there. Save some of that hostility for the bad guys! Just forget I said anything.
I'll be here if you need anything, Major. Good luck.
